get.description: Downloads a file containing warnings and errors encountered during the import process.

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.description: The `X-Api-Key` header is used to authenticate with your API key.

parameters.name: importId
parameters.description: The ID of the import job

200.description: Successful operation - returns a CSV file

sample.value:
row,status,'source field','AML field',message,time
